title: React
description: React is front end library developed by Facebook. It's used for handling view layer for web and mobile apps. ReactJS allows us to create reusable UI components. It is currently one of the most popular JavaScript libraries and it has strong foundation and large community behind it.

title: Redux
description: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps. It helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test. On top of that, it provides a great developer experience, such as live code editing combined with a time traveling debugger.

title: Lodash
description: Lodash is a JavaScript library which provides utility functions for common programming tasks using the functional programming paradigm.

title: EsLint
description: A pluggable and configurable linter tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript. Maintain your code quality with ease
